name: Break Into Flareon's House and Date Him??
name_original: Break Into Flareon's House and Date Him??
description:
"Break Into Flareon's House and Date Him??" is a meme game where you repeatedly get thrown out of Flareon's house for home invasion. What combination of dialogue options will win your way into his heart? What stupid jokes and unnecessary lore will you find along the way? Find out now in this 15-20 min experience!

Oh also, there isn't a 4th ending.

Story

If you're still here after reading that, you know what you're getting yourself into.
